posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase some 1910 T212-2 Obak catchers (150 subjects).

Have Armbruster and Berry so far. My Berry has the standard San Francisco on the uniform. Rumor has it that a version exists without the team name, which I would be interested in adding to my collection.

Will pay well for others catchers including: Hap Hogan (Vernon), Mickey LaLonge, and Hugh Smith. Looking for nice creaseless examples.

Thanks,


Patrick
